DOC.brief_summary: Training paramedic new skill via classroom-based teaching inherent cost time constraint . The investigator seek evaluate whether web-based didactics result similar knowledge improvement retention FAST ( Focused Assessment Sonography Trauma ) compare traditional method .
DOC.detailed_description: Paramedics randomize classroom group traditional lecture web group watch narrated lecture online . All participant complete pre- post-test , second post-test four week later . Both group undergo hands-on training first post-test . A control group complete two initial test without didactic intervention .
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent participate study emergency medical professional ( paramedic , nurse , physician ) meet criterion
